title: Expect SUVs to account 65 pc of total sales in India this year, 20 pc from EVs by 2030: Hyundai
description: Hyundai Motor India plans to invest Rs 7,000 crore on its second plant at Talegaon in Maharashtra, aiming to increase sports utility vehicle sales to 65% of its overall volumes in 2024. The company also plans to introduce the new Creta mid-sized SUV and commence production at the newly acquired plant.
